news.headline: Procter & Gamble (NYSE:PG) Appoints Former Eaton CEO Craig Arnold to Board
news.summary: Procter & Gamble (NYSE:PG) has appointed Craig Arnold to its Board of Directors, bringing his extensive experience in corporate leadership to the company. news.headline: P&G Appoints Craig Arnold to Board of Directors
news.summary: CINCINNATI, June 09, 2025--The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) today announced the appointment of Craig Arnold, former Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Eaton Corporation, to its Board of Directors, effective June 9, 2025. news.headline: Consumer Goods Giants Slim Down to Spur Growth
news.summary: Scale for scale's sake appears to have become passé, with conglomerates jockeying for market share with a more focused brand identity.
